text:
The documented SSHExec attribute inputstring is not implemented in the SSHExec task, but the non-
documented attribute inputproperty is implemented.
http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/sshexec.html
creator: mariano.cano@gmail.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
with svn revision 1063224 inputstring has been implemented, its /since/ tag
fixed and inputproperty documented.

Thanks.
